articles.author: Tom Westbrook
articles.title: Soaring yields leave stocks struggling for headway
articles.description: Treasury yields hit new decade highs in Asia on Tuesday as traders grew wary of how long interest rates might need to stay elevated, with the higher risk-free rate putting a dampener on stocks even as beaten-down Chinese markets attempted a rebound.
articles.content: SINGAPORE, Aug 22 (Reuters) - Treasury yields hit new decade highs in Asia on Tuesday as traders grew wary of how long interest rates might need to stay elevated, with the higher risk-free rate puttiâ€¦ [+3647 chars]

articles.author: Kevin Kelleher
articles.title: Buybacks vs dividends? In market downturns, the rules may change
articles.description: CFOs can return profits to shareholders with dividends and buybacks. Here's how they may fare during a stock market selloff or recession.
